reading: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. He was with God in the beginning. Through him all things were made; without him nothing was made that has been made. In him was life, and that life was the light of all mankind. The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
intro:
John’s gospel

Welcome to day one. Today you’re going to read the introduction to John’s gospel. This is one of the four accounts of the life of Jesus. Over the next week you’ll be reading small sections from this account, and seeing how it fits into the whole Bible.
